embeds.title: Bot Help Page
embeds.description:
The Commands are only useable with the / command interaction.
That means, the prefix is `/`

fields.name: setup
fields.value:
> setup setlog
> setup setkeyvalidation
> setup setlauncheractivation
> setup setviprole
> setup setbetarole
> setup emojis (inactive)
> setup setmainserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setactiveserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setbackupserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setupdatechannel

Permission needed: `MANAGE_SERVER`

fields.name: Supportsystem:
fields.value:
> ticket setlog (Permission: `MANAGE_SERVER`)
> ticket setcategorie (Permision: `MANAGE_SERVER`)
> ticket setchannel (Permission: `MANAGE_SERVER`)
> ticket new (Permission: `EVERYONE`)
> ticket fixuser
> ticket add
> ticket remove
> ticket ban
> ticket unban
> ticket lock (inactive)
> ticket unlock (inactive)
> ticket close
> ticket closerequest (Permission: `EVERYONE`
> ticket newforother (inactive)

fields.name: Random
fields.value:
> key validation
> launcher activation

Permissions needed: `VIEW_AUDITLOG`

embeds.footerText:
For more infos view the command itself.
This page is maybe not accurate.

Bot created by AveGamers - Jonas#3968

embeds.title: ${customEmoji("syslxlogo")} SYSLX SUPPORT
embeds.description:
Hello ${member}, our ${serverVars("role.supportstaff")} team will be with you soon.

**Please follow the instructions posted by the bot!**

You have 10 minutes do answer, otherwise the ticket will be closed automaticly!
embeds.author: ${tempVars("member.tag")}

actions.message:
The ticket with ID ${globalVars("ticket.number")} has been created!
${tempVars("ticket.channel")}
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Hey ${member}

embeds.description:
You recieved a Key with buying our menu. 
Please paste this key in the chat below. It looks like:
`SYSLX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX-XXXXX`

actions.name: Send Message

embeds.description: Please paste your forum username below.

buttons.name: How can I get the link?

embeds.description: Head over to your profile by lciking on your name in the upper right hand corner.
Click again on your username.
Copy the URL and paste it into the chat.
Now please paste your forum profile link below.

actions.message: One moment please
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: ${customEmoji("ave_check")} Done ${customEmoji("ave_check")}
embeds.description:
Everything is done now. 

I informed our guy to activate your key. This shouldn't take long. 
The message is in ${serverVars("channel.keyvalidation")} and if you see a âœ… from <@!472359202996748289>, you are ready to download the menu from our forum.
As soon as you have your roles, open another ticket and I will help you with the next steps. 

This ticket will be left open until you are activated.

actions.message: Thats not a problem. A ${serverVars("role.supportstaff")} will handle your ticket from now on.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
You didn't respond in time. 
You now have to do it with ${serverVars("role.supportstaff")}!
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.description:
Now please head over to our [forum](https://syslx-menu.com/forum) and create an account.
Please don't use any special characters in your username, because it makes the validation much slower.
Please preferr using a yahoo mail, because we experience some issues with provider like google.

If you are done, press the button below.
embeds.footerText: Click on the word forum for a quick link to our forum.

Alright.

Thank you.

Now send me your launcher username, please.

actions.message: The ticket will be closed in 5 seconds...
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Alright. Please tell a ${serverVars("role.supportstaff")} your question.
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: ${customEmoji("ave_check")} Done ${customEmoji("ave_check")}
embeds.description:
Everything is done. 

I put you on the ${serverVars("channel.launcheractivation")} list. 
As soon as you see a âœ… reaction from an admin or higher, you are activated and ready to use the menu.
If you see a ${customEmoji("failed")} reaction, open another ticket and explain your issue. 
The activation can take up to 48 hours or longer, because we do it manually.

This should be everything. If you don't have any other question, you can hit the green button below. If you have anything else, hit the red button.

actions.message: You don't have any purchased Role. I won't put you on the list.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: The ticket will be closed in 25 seconds...
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: You didn' answer. A ${serverVars("role.supportstaff")} will help you now.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Your forum account doesn't match your launcher account. Please open another ticket with reason "Anything Else"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: The ticket will be closed in 25 seconds...
actions.name: Send Message

embeds.description:
I heard you recieved your roles. Nice ;D

Lets start creating your actual launcher account. 

> **Please read Carefully**

Please had over to our [forum](https://syslx-menu.com/forum). You will now see a VIP Download area. Click on this thread. 
Click on [SYSLX LAUNCHER DOWNLOAD](https://syslx-menu.com/forum/threads/syslx-launcher-download.6/)! The Big download button will get you the actual Launcher. Under this option are some dependencies. Please download all of them and install them.
If you anti virus software is arguing, disable it. If you use the windows defender, disable real time protection and the third party option. Then run the windows defender control and disable your defender.
Now extract the launcher to your desktop and run it with administrator perms. 
You will be prompted with with a login window. Right under the two fields should be an button saying "Dont have a launcher account yet?" Click on that.
Create your launcher account with the following rules:
> Use the same username as in the forum (case sensetive)
> Do not use any special characters like "&". Only letters and numbers are allowed.

Click the button below, if you are ready and done.

actions.message: Please fill out this:

embeds.description:
SYSLX BAN CHECKLIST:

```diff
+ 1. First time injected? (DD/MM/YYYY)
- 2. Last time injected?  (DD/MM/YYYY)
+ 3. Which SYSLX version did you use? (FREE, VIP, or Beta?)
- 4. Any other cheat providers used on that account?
+ 5. What features did you use / enable?
- 6. Have you ever use / inject any external macro / script / software?
+ 7. Did someone else, except for yourself use or used your Account?
- 8. How often did you use the options from 5.? (Please list them in how often you used each option)
+ 9. What windows version do/did you use? (Please your current windows version, check by typing "winver" in search bar)
```

Please fill this and send it back in here

actions.name: Send Message

embeds.title: Support Ticket
embeds.description:
**Do you need help with anything?**

Please select a categorie by clicking the dropdown menu below. 
You can also create a ticket with no reason by clicking the button.

Key Validation
> You just bought a copy of SYSLX VIP or BETA and want to complete your purchase.

Launcher activation
> You just bought SYSLX VIP or BETA and you want us to activate your account.

Launcher Support
> You have a problem with your launcher or it says to open a ticket.

Bug Report
> You found a bug and want to tell us more specific.

Ban Report
> You got banned from GTA Online. Help us making the menu safe

Unban Request
> You got banned from us. You can ask us to unban you.

Role Request
> You have lost a role and want it back.

Anything Else
> Your problem isn't listed? Click this

description: sets the channel where the ticket can be created

embeds.title: Bot Help Page
embeds.description:
The Commands are only useable with the / command interaction.
That means, the prefix is `/`

fields.name: setup
fields.value:
> setup setlog
> setup setkeyvalidation
> setup setlauncheractivation
> setup setviprole
> setup setbetarole
> setup emojis (inactive)
> setup setmainserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setactiveserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setbackupserver (Bot-Owner Only)
> setup setupdatechannel

Permission needed: `MANAGE_SERVER`
